data.actual_result: Chat shows on both sides as connected but can't hear each other on both sides System: Testflight 1.7.8 (47), iOS 10.2 Beta 4
data.expected_result: Hear the other person talking or be able to talk to the other person
data.short_description: Muting and exiting Discord DCs call but shows as still in call.
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a Direct call with someone - mute on iOS - exit app and go back into it
